title.en: Saikyou Onmyouji no Isekai Tenseiki ~Geboku no Youkaidomo ni Kurabete Monster ga Yowaisugirundaga~

altTitles.en: The Reincarnation of the Strongest Exorcist in Another World

altTitles.ja: 最強陰陽師の異世界転生記 ～下僕の妖怪どもに比べてモンスターが弱すぎるんだが～

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou Onmyouji no Isekai Tensei-ki ~Geboku no Youkai-domo ni Kurabete Monster ga Yowasugiru n da ga~

altTitles.zh-hk: 最強陰陽師的異世界轉生記 ～怪物比我的下僕妖怪弱太多了～

altTitles.zh: 最强阴阳师的异世界转生记

altTitles.en: The Reincarnation of the Strongest Onmyoji ~ These Monsters Are Too Weak Compared to My Youkai~

description.en:
Haruyoshi Kuga’s power as the strongest exorcist is all for naught when he is betrayed by his closest ally. With his dying breath, he casts the secret Spell of Reincarnation — when he next opens his eyes, he finds himself in a different world altogether, reincarnated as Seika Lamprogue, the son of a family of magic scholars!

He quickly learns that the magic in this new world is quite unlike the sorcery he learned in his past life and that he can’t use it. Fortunately for him, with his mastery of curses and the hordes of youkai at his disposal, he doesn’t need to. 

Haruyoshi (now Seika) is determined not to repeat his past mistakes in his second life by smartly laying low and avoiding flaunting his power. Yet accomplishing his goals and without drawing attention to himself proves to be easier said than done — will his powers be enough to live a happy life?! 

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-reincarnation-of-the-strongest-exorcist-in-another-world)

title.en: Classmate no Moto Idol ga, Tonikaku Kyodou Fushin Nan desu

altTitles.ja: クラスメイトの元アイドルが、とにかく挙動不審なんです。

altTitles.en: The Idol Girl in My Class Is Acting Suspiciously

altTitles.ja-ro: Class no Idol Bishoujo ga, Tonikaku Kyodou Fushin nan desu

description.en: Saegusa, who retired from idolry when she went to high school, is good-looking and intelligent. She is always cheerful and friendly, and is the most popular person at school. Takuya, however, knows a certain side of the highbrow Miss Saegusa. Today, too, a suspicious-looking woman in a dubious disguise appears at the convenience store where he works part-time. She is, in all likelihood, that Saegusa-san...?
description.ja: 高校進学を機にアイドルを引退した三枝さんは、容姿端麗かつ頭脳明晰。いつも明るくて人当たりも良く、学校で一番の人気者だ。しかし、そんな高嶺の花である三枝さんのとある一面を卓也は知っている。今日もバイト先のコンビニに現れる、怪しげな変装をした挙動不審な女性――。彼女はどう見てもあの三枝さんで…!?

altTitles.ja: 私のアリカ

description.en: A huge incident happens to Arika, the center of a hugely popular idol group. Is the culprit a fan? Or could it be... The light and dark sides of the glamorous idol industry are now exposed!
description.ja: 人気急上昇中のアイドルグループのセンター・アリカの身に起きた大事件。犯人はファンか、それとも‥‥。華々しいアイドル業界の光と闇が今暴かれる！
description.vi:
Mamiya Arika, nữ hát chính của nhóm nhạc thần tượng "Lyrical Trick" bỗng mất tích một cách bí ẩn. Và đầu mối duy nhất về dấu vết của cô chỉ đơn giản là một đoạn video camera an ninh.
Liệu đây có đơn giản chỉ là hành vi của một fan hâm mộ quá khích, một idol otaku hay không...!?

altTitles.ja: ヒゲと鈴としゃぼん玉

description.en: Santa and Rintarou are what can easily be described as an old married couple. they have been together for a long time and the series explores what is their day to day life.

altTitles.es-la: Cuando deje de ser tu sombra

altTitles.en: When I Stopped Being Your Shadow

altTitles.es-la: No Soy la Sombra de Nadie

description.en:
He was the hand of God, the painter of the century. My husband became the best artist in the empire.

And I was his shadow.

Even when my work went viral under my husband’s name, even when people spoke ill of me behind my back.

It was still good. Because I loved my husband.

But on our wedding anniversary.

“You are the only person I truly love.”

I witnessed my husband whispering his love to my best friend.

At the very moment when my husband saw me discovering his infidelity, his face contorted viciously and pushed me away.

“Where are you raising your voice to your husband?!”

I realized.

I realized that that man had never loved me.

So I decided to become the evil wife they spoke of.

*

“I have a special story for you.”

Ines suggested in a strained voice.

A man as beautiful as God turned his eyes gently to her.

“It’s a special story, our newspaper won’t print the case if it’s not good enough……..”

“It’s the fall of the painter known as the Hand of God…”

Ines continued in a tense voice.

“Isn’t this good enough a scandal to be published in Elton, the greatest daily newspaper in the empire?”

“Then what does Countess Brighton gain from the scandal?”

“My life.”
description.es-la:
Ryan, el marido que lo fue todo para Inés y a quien llamaron “La mano de Dios”.
Se hizo famoso gracias a las pinturas de Inés. “He sido la sombra de Ryan toda mi vida, pero ¿fui feliz?” “Al menos así era.”
Hasta que Ryan la traicionó por una última vez, Inés descubrió que sus esfuerzos por él habían sido en vano.

Tras una vida llena de arrepentimientos, regresa al pasado.
Ahora Inés tendrá la oportunidad de recuperar todo lo que le fue arrebatado.

title.en: A Former Delinquent Girl Falls in Love

altTitles.ja: 元ヤン娘、恋をする

description.en: Spin-off/Spiritual Sequel of the authors other work "The Mentor and the New Employee Who are Getting More and More Into Each Other"; with this story focusing on the mask wearing former delinquent and her budding romance with the little brother of the Female MC of the previous work.

altTitles.ja: ドクターストーン

description.en:
Imagine waking to a world where every last human has been mysteriously turned to stone…  

One fateful day, all of humanity was petrified by a blinding flash of light. After several millennia, high schooler Taiju awakens and finds himself lost in a world of statues. However, he's not alone! His science-loving friend Senku's been up and running for a few months and he's got a grand plan in mind—to kickstart civilization with the power of science!
description.it: Anno 5738: da migliaia di anni l'intera umanità si ritrova tramutata in pietra a causa di una catastrofe naturale. Ooki Taiju riesce inspiegabilmente a risvegliarsi, trovandosi così di fronte ad una realtà completamente diversa da quanto ricordava, dove la natura ha ripreso il sopravvento sulla civiltà umana. Al suo risveglio il ragazzo si ricongiunge con il suo amico Senkuu, un giovane e geniale scienziato anche lui risvegliatosi qualche mese prima. Insieme i ragazzi sperano di scoprire la causa dietro all'improvvisa tramutazione in pietra - e, nel frattempo, di trovare una cura. Non tutto, però, va come previsto...
description.pt: Imagina acordar em um mundo onde cada humano foi misteriosamente transformado em pedra… Em um dia fatídico, toda a humanidade foi petrificada em um piscar de olhos. Depois de muitos milênios, o aluno do ensino médio, Taiju, acorda e se encontra perdido em um mundo de estátuas. Entretanto, ele não está sozinho! Seu amigo que ama ciência, Senku, está acordado e correndo pelos últimos meses e ele tem um grande plano em mente, recomeçar a civilização com o poder da ciência!
description.ru: Однажды, когда Тайджу пытался собраться с духом, чтобы признаться девушке в любви, небо заполнил странный свет. Все люди, на которых он падал, превращались в камень. После без малого четырёх тысяч лет он наконец выбирается из каменного плена и начинает исследовать окрестности. Неожиданно Тайджу встречается его старый друг Сенку, очнувшийся полгода назад. Сенку приводит Тайджу в свой примитивный дом на дереве и просит помощи в возрождении исчезнувшей человеческой цивилизации, начиная с попыток выяснить истинную природу света, который превратил людей в камень.
description.pt-br: Um dia fatídico, toda a humanidade foi petrificada por um flash ofuscante de luz. Depois de vários milênios, o colegial Taiju desperta e se vê perdido em um mundo de estátuas. No entanto, ele não está sozinho! Seu amigo de ciência Senku está em funcionamento há alguns meses e ele tem um grande plano em mente: dar o pontapé inicial na civilização com o poder da ciência!

altTitles.ja: 絶滅寸前動物ハッチンパモス

description.en:
The Hacchin-Pamos is a critically-endangered species. Let's find out why.

A daily comic series from Q-Rais.

title.en: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni - Kataribanashi-hen Comic Anthology EX.

altTitles.ja: ひぐらしのなく頃に 語咄し編 コミックアンソロジーEX．

altTitles.ru: Когда Плачут Цикады: Глава о Сборнике Историй

description.en:
Kataribanashi-hen (語咄し編 Storytelling Chapter) is a compilation of winning fan stories for the Higurashi no Naku Koro ni series from the Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Contest (ひぐらしのなく頃に大賞).

Notably, the eight artists involved with the 10 main arcs of the manga all illustrated for at least one of the stories included in the novel volumes, while Karin Suzuragi and Jiro Suzuki even illustrated the cover arts for the manga volumes and Yutori Houjyou and Mimori each did the manga adaptation of a story. Among the other artists, Kei Natsumi, Soichiro, and Akai Higasa would later be involved with other works from 07th Expansion including Umineko no Naku Koro ni and Rose Guns Days. 

Some stories were adapted into a manga series named Kataribanashi-hen Comic Anthology EX (語咄し編 コミックアンソロジーEX Kataribanashi-hen Komikkuansorojī EX).

altTitles.ja: いけいけ！百科事典娘

altTitles.en: Wikipe-tan manga

description.en:
"Go Go! Encyclopedia Girls", drawn by: Kasuga

Wikiquote-tan: You know, there are often things that we all know but don't know the name of.

Commons-tan: Like those metallic mushroom-like things that grow in the harbour.

Wikipe-tan: [Bollards!](https://commons.m.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Mooring_bollards)

Wikipe-tan: You mean those pillar-like things that moor ships to the harbour, right? Those are mooring bollards...

Wikipe-tan: ...huh?

(Source: [Wikipedia](https://commons.m.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Wikipe-tan_manga_page1.jpg#mw-jump-to-license))

altTitles.en: The Queen Under Her Veil

description.en: After being reborn, Sayi vows to break free of her foster mother’s control.

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

title.en: Doukyo Shiteiru Kensei no Onna Shishou ga Kawaisugite Mainichi Shiawase Desu

altTitles.ja: 同居している剣聖の女師匠が可愛すぎて毎日幸せです

altTitles.en: My Female Sword Master, Whom I Live With, Is So Cute That I'm Happy Every Day

altTitles.es-la: La Maestra Espadachina que Vive Conmigo es Demasiado Linda y me Hace Feliz Cada Día

description.en:
Eugene Dawson is a young man with a goal: to become strong. He trains under and lives with his mentor, Liza Parsandra, who is regarded as a Sword Saint. In terms of physical prowess, Liza is without equal, and despite her scatterbrained nature, Eugene still enjoys each day with his adorable mentor. However, her defenseless nature, drop-dead gorgeous looks and tendency towards unintentional skin-ship make training feel like an impossible task...?!

"Is this really going to help me get stronger?!"
description.ja:
強くなりたいと望む少年、ユージン・ドーソンは、
剣聖と謳われた師匠・リザ・パルサンドラの元で住み込みで修行中。

腕っぷしは最強だけど、私生活はポンコツで可愛い師匠との日常は毎日幸せ･･･
かと思いきや、無防備でエッチな体と無自覚なスキンシップに修行どころではないようで･･･!?
こんなので俺、強くなれるの!?
description.es-la:
La guerra contra los Demonios ha terminado, y ahora nuestro protagonista que vive con su Maestra que lo cuida y lo entrena como última voluntad de la madre de nuestro protagonista hacía ella y con el permiso de esta de ponerle las manos encima

¿Cómo afectará que un chico y una chica vivan bajo el mismo techo?, La Maestra con un gran cuerpo y algo ingenua y nuestro protagonista que no es ajeno los encantos de su Maestra, ¿Cómo se desarrollará esto?
description.pt-br:
Eugene Dawson é um jovem rapaz com um objetivo; se tornar forte.
Ele treina e vive com sua mentora, Liza Parsandra, que é considerada uma Santa da Espada.

Em termos de destreza física, Liza é incomparável e, apesar de sua natureza avoada, Eugene ainda aproveita cada dia com sua adorável mentora.

No entanto, sua natureza indefesa, sua aparência linda de morrer e sua tendência à contato físico involuntário fazem com que o treinamento pareça uma tarefa impossível...!?

“Isso vai mesmo me ajudar a ficar mais forte!?”

altTitles.en: Skip & Loafer

altTitles.ja: スキップとローファー

description.en:
Iwakura Mitsumi always had big dreams, of leaving her small town, advancing to a top tier university, and then contributing to the country before retiring back to her home town. So focused is she on her goal that she is oblivious to all the other ways she comes up short, much to the chagrin and concern of her friends and family. Can a naive country girl make it in Tokyo?  
  
Nominated for the 2020 Manga Taisho Award, came in third behind the winner Blue Period and second place, Spy x Family.

title.en: I Became The King by Scavenging

description.en: Good news, it has been detected that your profession is a hidden profession. Bad news, your hidden profession is one in ten thousand: ‘Trash.’ You are about to change jobs to… ‘Scavenger.’ Ye Qing felt a white flash before his eyes upon seeing the results, all his years of effort went down the drain. Borrowing money at high interest rates to speculate on stocks and losing it all, thrown into a private hunting group by creditors to work off his debts in the dark. After defeating a Demonic Beast that was supposed to be impossible to kill, that instant influx of experience points allowed Ye Qing to level up from 0 to 1, triggering the only job change opportunity in his life… But unexpectedly, the profession he awakened to was the globally one in ten thousand hidden profession—’Scavenger.’ All the talent trees are centered around the bizarre profession of ‘picking up trash.

altTitles.ja: タワーダンジョン

description.en:
The setting is a certain kingdom. In order to save the kidnapped princess of the kingdom, the Kingsguard squadron challenges the "Dragon Tower," a gigantic structure floating in the middle of the sky, but they are blocked by powerful demons.
A provocation is made by a neighboring village to replenish the injured personnel, and when a young man is sent to the tower, the wheel of fate begins to turn.

Tale of sword & sorcery and labyrinth exploration begins!
description.pt-br:
Para salvar a princesa Ignelia que foi sequestrada por um necromante, o Batalhão da Guarda Real se aventura pela “Torre do Dragão”, uma estrutura gigantesca que costumava flutuar no meio do céu, mas são bloqueados por criaturas poderosas. 
Uma ordem de recrutamento é enviado para uma aldeia vizinha para repor os soldados feridos, e quando um jovem é enviado para a Torre, a roda do destino começa a girar.

Começa a história de espadas, feitiçaria e exploração do labirinto!

altTitles.en: Other World Warrior
Two-Dimensional Mercenary

altTitles.ja: 異次元傭兵

description.en:
Would you like to find a job? Even at the cost of your soul? If so, then you’ve found the right place. Our job hunting advice website, SoSe, is a site geared towards those willing to even sell their souls for employment; that’s right, people like you. Are you dealing with angels or demons?  
  
30-year old freeloader Chul Ho Kang made a deal through this shady site, even selling his soul for the chance at what else? Money! An invitation to the other world for the weak and downtrodden of society for a chance to change their lot in life! That is the mission given to Chul Ho Kang!
description.es:
¿Te gustaría encontrar un trabajo? ¿Incluso si te cuesta el alma? Si es así, entonces ha encontrado el lugar correcto.

Nuestro sitio de consejos laborales, SoSe, reúne a aquellos que incluso quieren vender su alma por un trabajo, así es, gente como tú. ¿Alguna vez has negociado con ángeles o demonios? Un trabajador independiente de 30 años llamado Chul Ho Kang hizo un trato en este extraño sitio web, ¿y qué oferta aceptaría para vender su alma? ¡Dinero, por supuesto!

¡Una invitación a otro mundo para los más débiles y oprimidos de la sociedad para tener la oportunidad de cambiarlo todo! ¡Esa es la misión encomendada a Chul Ho KanG!
description.id:
Apa anda ingin mendapat pekerjaan? Meski harus menjual jiwa anda? Jika benar, di sinilah tempat yang tepat untuk anda. Situs pencarian pekerjaan ini ditujukan untuk anda yang ingin mendapat pekerjaan meski harus menjual jiwa anda. Seorang pengangguran bernama Kim Cheol Ho telah membuat kesepakatan dengan situs itu. Untuk apa semua itu? Tentu saja demi mendapatkann uang! Undangan ke dimensi lain untuk orang-orang yang lemah dan tertindas, memberi kesempatan untuk mengubah nasib! Itulah misi yang diberikan kepada Kim Cheol Ho.

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B9HJG_PJNNE)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5900/)

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/38753)
description.ja:
友達に騙され借金を抱えてしまった「柏崎 哲平」。 就職するために就活サイト「タマナビ」で必要な情報を入力しただけなのに… 気づくと戦場に立っていた！？ 「タマナビ」から派遣される異次元で任務を遂行して大金を稼げるようになった「哲平」は自分を騙した友達に復讐を企むが…

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B9HJG_PJNNE)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5900/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Prajurit-Dimensi-Lain/3463)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/38753)
description.ko:
취직하고 싶습니까?
영혼을 팔아서라도 취직하고 싶으십니까?
그렇다면 잘 오셨습니다.
취업 정보 사이트 영팔이는 영혼을 팔아서라도
일자리를 구하고 싶은 이, 바로 당신을 위한 곳입니다.

천사인가, 악마인가.
서른 살 백수 강철호는 정체 모를 그들과 계약을 했다.
영혼을 팔아서라도 돈, 그놈의 돈을 벌기 위해!

다른 차원의 계약자들에게 빙의하여,
그들이 가장 절망하던 순간의 삶을 바꾸는 것!
그것이 강철호에게 주어진 사명, 미션(Mission)이다!

************************************************

소설에서 다 풀지 못했던 이야기가
지금 여기에서 펼쳐집니다!



[시즌1] 만화 김재환 
[시즌2, 3] 만화 발로 
[로고 및 표지 디자인] 디자인그룹 헌드레드

************************************************

웹툰 [이차원 용병]은 매주 금요일, 주1회 연재됩니다.

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B9HJG_PJNNE)

description.pl:
Chciałbyś znaleźć pracę? Nawet kosztem własnej duszy? Jeśli tak, to dobrze trafiłeś! Nasza strona internetowa z poradami dotyczącymi poszukiwania pracy SoSe, jest stroną skierowaną do osób, które są gotowe sprzedać swoją duszę za pracę; to prawda, ludzie tacy jak ty! Masz do czynienia z aniołami czy demonami?  
30-letni darmozjad Chul Ho Kang zawarł umowę za pośrednictwem tej podejrzanej strony, sprzedając swoją duszę, by mieć szansę na co…? Pieniądze?! Zaproszenie do innego świata słabych i uciskanych przez społeczeństwo, aby móc zmienić ich los! To właśnie misja powierzona Chul Ho Kang!

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B9HJG_PJNNE)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5900/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Prajurit-Dimensi-Lain/3463)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/38753)
description.ru:
«Вы в поисках работы? Готовы за неё душу дьяволу продать? Если ваш ответ на эти вопросы положительный, то вы именно там, где должны быть! Soul Sellers – сайт, который помогает людям, готовым продать душу за работу. Именно – таким людям, как вы!»Наш главный герой — 30-летний нахлебник Чхоль Хо Кан — заключил сделку через этот странный сайт, продав душу за что? За деньги! Его перенесло в другой мир, в котором он должен бороться за свои жизнь и будущее!

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B9HJG_PJNNE)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5900/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Prajurit-Dimensi-Lain/3463)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/38753)
description.tr:
İş bulmak ister misin? Ruhun pahasına bile mi? Öyleyse doğru yerdesin. İş tavsiyesi sitemiz, ”Soul Sellers” iş bulmak uğruna ruhunu bile satacaklar için tasarlanmıştır. Peki kimlerle uğraşıyorsun: Meleklerle mi? Yoksa şeytanlarla mı? 30 yaşındaki işsiz Chul Ho Kang bu şüpheli sitede bir anlaşma yapıp, ruhunu para uğruna sattı! Toplumun güçsüz ve ezilen kişileri için kaderlerini değiştirmeleri adına başka bir dünyaya davetiye! Bu Chul Ho Kang’a verilmiş bir görev.

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B9HJG_PJNNE)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5900/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Prajurit-Dimensi-Lain/3463)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/38753)
description.zh:
30岁的无业游民姜哲浩在浏览就业网站时，遇到了一家奇怪的公司。这家公司声称可以改变姜哲浩现在的窘迫生活，而条件就是卖掉自己的灵魂。为了金钱，为了金钱，为了金钱！姜哲浩最终签下了合约！而这时才发现，这家公司竟然可以把人送往其他世界……

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B9HJG_PJNNE)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5900/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Prajurit-Dimensi-Lain/3463)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/38753)
description.es-la:
¿Te gustaría encontrar un trabajo? ¿Incluso si te cuesta el alma? Si es así, entonces ha encontrado el lugar correcto.

Nuestro sitio de consejos laborales, SoSe, reúne a aquellos que incluso quieren vender su alma por un trabajo, así es, gente como tú. ¿Alguna vez has negociado con ángeles o demonios? Un trabajador independiente de 30 años llamado Chul Ho Kang hizo un trato en este extraño sitio web, ¿y qué oferta aceptaría para vender su alma? ¡Dinero, por supuesto!

¡Una invitación a otro mundo para los más débiles y oprimidos de la sociedad para tener la oportunidad de cambiarlo todo! ¡Esa es la misión encomendada a Chul Ho KanG!
description.pt-br:
Você gostaria de encontrar um trabalho? Mesmo se isso custasse sua alma? Se sim, então você encontrou o lugar certo.

Nosso site de aconselhamento de trabalho, SoSe, reune esses que querem até mesmo vender sua alma por um emprego, isso mesmo, pessoas como você. Já negociou com anjos ou demônios? Um free-lancer de 30 anos de idade chamado Chul Ho Kang fez um negócio nesse site estranho, e qual seria a proposta que ele aceitaria vender a alma? Dinheiro, é claro!

Um convite para outro mundo para o mais fraco e oprimido da sociedade para uma chance de mudar tudo! Essa é a missão dada para Chul Ho KanG!

title.en: Kiraware Majo to Karada ga Irekawatta Keredo, Watashi wa Kyou mo Genki ni Kurashiteimasu!

altTitles.ja: 嫌われ魔女と体が入れ替わったけれど、私は今日も元気に暮らしています！

altTitles.en: I Swapped Bodies With a Wicked Witch, but Today I'll Keep Having Fun!

description.en: A happy slow life begins with a switch! Marietta, princess of the snow country of Snewe, is trapped in a magic tower because she can't use magic. 8 years later, on her wedding day with the prince of the silver country, she thought she had succeeded in summoning a holy beast, but then... What appeared was...?
description.ja: 取り決めにより雪の国・スニューウから大国・ジルヴァラに輿入れしてきた王女・マリエッタ。しかし魔法が使えないマリエッタは塔に幽閉され、7年後に行われる聖獣召喚の儀式を成功させるため、ひたすら魔法の修行を強いられた。そして7年後見事に白い竜を召喚したマリエッタだが、次の瞬間謎の声にいざなわれ、気がつけば見知らぬ場所にいた。しかも見た目はそっくりなのに、どんな魔法も使えるほど魔力に溢れた身体になっていて…。

altTitles.en: Love Me Before You Die

altTitles.ja: 墜落JKと廃人教師

description.en:
Mikoto Ochiai is ready to jump off the rooftop of her high school's building after she got rejected by the boy she loves. However, homeroom teacher Jin Haiba suddenly appears on the rooftop for a smoke, talked to her, and saved her from falling down. He even asked her to go out with him rather than die.   
  
A black comedy manga about love, life, and death.
description.es-la:
Mikoto Ochiai está pronto para pular do telhado do colégio depois que ela foi rejeitada pelo garoto que ama. Porém, o professor dela, Jin Haiba, repentinamente aparece para fumar no telhado onde a convenceu a não pular e ainda pediu para sair com ele.  
  
Um mangá com humor pesado, sobre amor, vida, e morte

title.en: Musket Girls! ~Tensei Sanbou to Senretsu Otome-tachi~

altTitles.en: Musket Girls! Reincarnated Staff Officer and Line Formation Maidens

altTitles.ja: マスケットガールズ！～転生参謀と戦列乙女たち～

description.en: After my previous life was cut short, I was reincarnated in a world of early modern-style warfare where line infantry exchanges gunfire. Being a commoner second lieutenant, I was shunned as "Krombertz the Grim Reaper" because of the many deaths of my men in battle. With that, I was assigned to the 6th Special Tasks Brigade, an all-female unit, as a staff officer. The brigade commander, who is up to something, and the carefree non-commissioned officer are women, while the foot soldiers are just girls who are practically amateurs. In this world, if you don't fight, you will be killed. That being the case, I have to do something about this... but how?!

title.en: Yande Kita Mahou Shoujo no Nichijou

altTitles.ja: 病んできた魔法少女の日常

altTitles.id: Keseharian Gadis Penyihir yang Jatuh Sakit

altTitles.en: The Daily Life of a Mentally-Ill Magical Girl
Damn Reincarnation

altTitles.ja: このろくでもない素晴らしき転生

altTitles.th: การเกิดใหม่สุดเฮงซวย

description.en:
When the warrior Hamel sacrifices himself to protect his rival Bermut Lionhart, he makes Bermut vow to vanquish the last of the demon kings.

Reincarnated with his memories 300 years later, he is shocked to find that not only are the demon kings still alive, but that he has been reborn as Eugene Lionhart, a member of his former rival’s bloodline!

Now, as Eugene comes of age, he must train to prove himself as a Lionhart and eliminate the remaining demon kings once and for all.

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7LNsxm0UazQ)
description.fa:
هامیل یکی از همراهان قهرمان ورماف قبل از نبرد با شاه شیاطین بخاطر نجات دوستش خودش را فدا میکنه ولی بخاطر این تناسخ لعنتی تو 
. بدن نواده  قهرمان ورماف افسانه ای دوباره زنده میشه
description.ko:
마왕을 없애기 위해 용사와 함께 모험을 하던 하멜. 
마왕과의 대결 직전 용사 베르무트 라이언하트를 구하고 대신 죽음을 맞이하게 된다. 

그리고 300년 후. 

하멜은 용사의 머나먼 후손인 유진 라이언하트로서 환생한다. 
죽기 전의 육체보다 월등한 성능을 가진 천재로서. 

전생의 경험을 토대로 더 뛰어난 육체에 맞춰 폭발적인 성장을 하는 유진. 
전생에 이루지 못한 마왕 토벌을 위해 유진은 쉼없이 자신을 단련하며 이루지 못했던 목표를 향해 다시 나아간다.

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7LNsxm0UazQ)
description.pt-br:
O guerreiro Hamel partiu em uma aventura com seus companheiros para derrotar os Reis Demônios, mas depois de morrer pouco antes da batalha final contra eles…

“O quêêêê?”
“Mas que porra é essa?!”

Ele foi reencarnado como descendente de seu companheiro guerreiro, Vermouth.
Hamel — não, Eugene Lionheart renasceu com o sangue do Grande Vermouth.

‘Meu corpo anterior tinha talento suficiente para ser confundido com um gênio, mas este… Não há como comparar.’

Com um corpo que tinha atributos mais altas desde o começo, ele mostrou um crescimento explosivo que superou em muito o que havia alcançado em sua vida anterior.

Junto com as razões desconhecidas para sua reencarnação veio a realidade incômoda de ter que conviver com demônios.
Ele se deparou com um mundo que o fez questionar tudo em que acreditava.

Como Eugene, ele começa a percorrer o caminho que não concluiu em sua vida anterior.

title.en: The Words of The Beloved Sun

description.en:
One shall become a king, and the other shall become a sacrifice for the king.
On the day Crown Princes Tae Chan-ryang and Tae Ho-wol were born, a prophecy descended from the heavens. 
Who will be the one to survive?

altTitles.en: Gyeoggi 3 ban

description.en:
A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/mymmx89)

On the Jiuzhou continent, humans, demons, various races coexist. The human race is led by the Daqing Immortal Dynasty, where mortals and cultivators live together. However, cultivation requires a one-in-ten-thousand talent. When mortals cause trouble, there is the patrol camp to deal with them. When nobles cause trouble, there is the Jinyiwei. But when cultivators and demons cause trouble with their sorcery, only the Sword-Wielding Person can bring peace. The Sword-Wielding Person is no different from an ordinary person; with a single Sword, they can easily slay cultivators.

title.en: My Stepsister Who is Perfect in Public, Shows Her True Colors at Home

altTitles.ja: 外面は最高なのに、家では本性むき出しの義姉

altTitles.ja-ro: Sotozura wa Saikou na no ni, Ie de wa Honsei Mukidashi no Gimai

altTitles.en: Even though the outside is the best, her sister-in-law has a bare nature at home

altTitles.es-la: Mi hermanastra que es perfecta en público, muestra su verdadera cara en casa.

description.en:
**Second English title is the one used on Amazon.** (I know it's not correct but thought I'd add it)

~ Heatmanga

altTitles.en: Certain Victory Dungeon Administration Technique
The Way to Absolute Dungeon Administration – There Is No Reason To Meet With the Opponent!

altTitles.ru: Путь к абсолютному доминированию в подземелье!

altTitles.ja: 必勝ダンジョン運営方法　相手に合わせる理由がない

altTitles.ja-ro: Hisshō Danjon Un'ei Hōhō Aite ni Awaseru Niyū ga Nai

description.en:
One day in a sunny leisure day, a woman visited my house and asked me if I'm interested in managing a dungeon along with support from a goddess. But of course, I refused. Eh? I shouldn't ignore a person in trouble, moreover if it's a beautiful woman? No way, that's too bothersome and why do I have to do that? I'm perfectly satisfied with my comfortable life now, throwing it away is just overly stupid… Sigh, fine.   
So I just go to another world, become a dungeon master, manage a dungeon, and deal with a mana circulation problem? Understood, but how to do it? Let me show you how…
description.ru: Однажды солнечным днём, мою обитель посетила женщина, её интересовало не хочу ли я управлять подземельем, заручившись при этом поддержкой богини. Естественно, я отказался. Я поступил верно, разве не так? А? Не стоит отказывать человеку в беде, особенно красивой женщине? Исключено, это слишком хлопотно, зачем мне в это ввязываться? Я живу спокойной жизнью и меня это вполне устраивает, разрушить эту идиллию было бы верхом безрассудства… Ай, ну хорошо, отправлюсь в новый мир, стану хозяином подземелья, буду управлять им и иметь дело с проблемами циркуляции маны? Понял, но как с этим справиться?

altTitles.en: Guwon Hasoseo

description.en: Hyeongoh, the first place student at school, is disabled and has a knack for getting ridiculed by the school's bullies. With no help and no way out, he finds himself in a despairing situation…until someone appears to stand by his side!

altTitles.ja: マリッジトキシン

altTitles.en: MARRIAGETOXIN

description.en:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

------
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

altTitles.ja: 聖闘士星矢EPISODE.Gレクイエム

description.en: The world is wrapped in flames and about to be destroyed by the actions of primordial gods intending to cleanse the planet. While the goddess Athena stands alone in a desperate attempt to contain the worst of the attack, it is up to Seiya, the last Saint standing, to battle the gods and join her to save the earth. The final battle of the Gold Saints is about to begin.

altTitles.en: Delinquent high school girl KuzuHana-chan
Yankee high school girl KuzuHana-chan

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio KuzuHana-chan

description.en:
At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! 

While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone.

Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr:
Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359 !

Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix.

Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja:
男女比率1対359!!　359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!!　つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!!　コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!!
四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br:
Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?!

Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

altTitles.ja: ドッグスレッド

altTitles.en: Dogs Red

description.en:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

altTitles.en: Chieri's Love Is 8 Meters Tall

description.en:
An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!

The start of a literally larger-than-life romcom!
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

altTitles.ja: だらしないです 堀田先生！

description.en: Makoto Kuribayashi is your typical high schooler with a not-so-typical after-school gig as a housekeeper. His latest client? None other than his school’s most popular teacher, the gorgeous Rumiko Hotta. But Hotta-sensei is hiding a dirty little secret: she's a total slob, the polar opposite of her flawless public image! Now, Makoto's got the unenviable task of cleaning up after her mess. Will his admiration for Hotta-sensei survive a dose of harsh reality in this irreverent comedy?

altTitles.ja: デモンズ・クレスト

description.en: In the year 2031, in which elementary school student Yuma Ashihara participates in a beta test of the world's first full-dive VRMMO-RPG called "Actual Magic (AM)", only to lose consciousness while playing and wake up in a world where the game and reality have merged. A death game then unfolds in "mixed reality."
description.it: Nell'anno 2031, lo studente di scuola elementare Yuma Ashihara partecipa a un beta test del primo VRMMO-RPG al mondo chiamato "Actual Magic (AM)", solo per perdere conoscenza mentre gioca e risvegliarsi in un mondo in cui il gioco e la realtà si sono fusi. Un gioco mortale si svolge quindi nella "realtà mista".
description.pt-br: No ano de 2031, no qual o estudante do ensino fundamental Yuma Ashihara participa de um teste beta do primeiro VRMMO-RPG completo do mundo chamado "Magia Real (AM)", apenas para perder a consciência enquanto joga e acordar em um mundo onde o jogo e realidade se fundiram. Um jogo da morte então se desenrola em "realidade mista".

altTitles.ja: カーストロマンス

description.en: Jin Daim has no friends, but likes drawing. Iljina is the most popular girl in school, even though she rejects every confession. Daim thinks she and her friends are an annoyance and disturbs his drawing time before class, but all he ever draws is her. Things get complicated when his secret sketch books gets discovered by one of Iljina's friends.

title.en: Blue Archive - The Adventure of Game Development Department!

altTitles.ja: ブルーアーカイブゲーム開発部だいぼうけん！

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive: Cuộc phiêu lưu của Câu lạc bộ Phát Triển Game

altTitles.ru: Blue Archive: Грандиозное приключение отдела разработки игр!

description.en: From the hit game Blue Archive, comes a spin-off manga featuring the Game Development Department! Where Momoi, Midori, Yuzu and Aris share their days of youth, friendship, and clumsy moments. A heartwarming, cute and funny youth-comedy crafted by the master of comedy, Asato Mizu!
description.ja: 人気ゲーム「ブルーアーカイブ」よりゲーム開発部のスピンオフが登場！モモイ、ミドリ、ユズ、アリスの4人が送る青春、友情、ぽんこつの日々...。コメディの名手・水あさとが手掛ける、笑えて泣けて可愛い青春コメディ！
description.ru: Спин-офф манга по мотивам популярной игры Blue Archive, в которой девочки из отдела разработки игр делятся смешными историями о своей юности и дружбе. Это душевная и милая история, созданная мастером комедии Мидзу Асато!
description.vi: Bộ truyện chuyển thể từ trò chơi đang làm mưa làm gió "Blue Archive" với sự xuất hiện của Câu lạc bộ Phát Triển Game! Nơi Momoi, Midori, Yuzu và Arisu cùng nhau sẻ chia những năm tháng của tuổi trẻ, tình bạn và những khoảnh khoắc vụng về. Đây là một câu chuyện ấm lòng, hài hước và dễ thương từ Bậc thầy Truyện hài Mizu Asato!

altTitles.ja: ダンスインザヴァンパイアバンド

description.en:
After millennia in hiding, Mina Ţepeş, the princess of the ancient covenant and ruler of all vampires, wants change. Using the vast wealth of the Ţepeş line, she has paid off the entire gross national debt of Japan and in so doing, gained the authority to create a "special district" off the coast of Japan that is to become the future haven to vampires the world over!   
  
Now, on the eve of the landmark press conference announcing the existence of vampires to the world, terrorists and rival factions are plotting to assassinate Mina Ţepeş before she has a chance to make her world-changing announcement.

title.en: Mermaid Melody Pichi Pichi Pitch: Aqua

altTitles.ja: マーメイドメロディー ぴちぴちピッチ aqua

description.en: Lukia Nanami is turning seventeen. Her family has just moved to a town by the sea, and on her first walk down to the beach, she saves a handsome surfer from drowning. The next day, she’s shocked to discover he’s not only a classmate at her new school, but has no idea who she is, and insists he was saved by a mermaid! A new chapter in the saga of *Mermaid Melody Pichi Pichi Pitch*, from original artist Pink Hanamori! [Kodansha]

altTitles.ja: 神殺しの模倣使い

altTitles.en: Godslayer's Imitator

description.en:
"If it’s to protect someone close to me… then I’d even kill a god."

Half a century ago, Dungeons, Monsters, as well as people who had received special abilities commonly referred to as [Skills] appeared. Those people were referred to as Adventurers and challenged dungeons in search of dreams and riches.

Kisaragi Tsukasa is one of these adventurers. However, he has received an inferior skill and was often treated as trash. One day, he was tricked by his peers and was thrown into a dangerous dungeon.

What awaited him at the other end was the Mythical monster, the God-Eater Fenrir. In despair over the overwhelming power difference, Tsukasa was prepared to die. That was when the master of the dungeon, Loki, appeared before him.

“Welcome to my castle.”

Thanks to Loki, Tsukasa’s skill evolved to become [Copycat]... A unique boy-meets-girl story woven into a modern battle fantasy is about to begin!
description.pt-br: "Se for para proteger alguém próximo a mim... então eu até mataria um deus." Meio século atrás, Dungeons, Monstros, bem como pessoas que receberam habilidades especiais comumente chamadas de [Skills] apareceram. Essas pessoas eram chamadas de Aventureiros e desafiavam masmorras em busca de sonhos e riquezas. Kisaragi Tsukasa é um desses aventureiros. No entanto, ele recebeu uma habilidade inferior e muitas vezes foi tratado como lixo. Um dia, ele foi enganado por seus colegas e jogado em uma Dungeon perigosa. O que o esperava do outro lado era o monstro mítico, o Devorador de Deuses Fenrir. Em desespero com a esmagadora diferença de poder, Tsukasa estava preparado para morrer. Foi então que o mestre da masmorra, Loki, apareceu diante dele. “Bem-vindo ao meu castelo.” Graças a Loki, a habilidade de Tsukasa evoluiu para se tornar [Imitador]... a fantasia está prestes a começar!

title.en: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng, Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo
Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.es-la: El Gran Villano Hermano Mayor y todas sus Hermanas Menores Yandere

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

title.en: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: 兄貴の彼女になる、女の子になっちゃった弟。

description.en:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?

altTitles.en: Scissor Seven: Black and White Twin Dragons 2

description.en: Sequel to [Wu Liu Qi: Heibai Shuanglong](https://mangadex.org/title/757ffc27-5baf-40c3-9bad-3a1859837936)
description.zh: 不良少年莫浪和高冷天才白其在居住的村庄遇到了神秘刺客,彻底颠覆了他 们的认知和生活。于是两人两人踏上了冒险之路。在与斯特国的较量中,莫 浪身受重伤,白其也在爆炸之中不知去向。当莫浪养好伤之后开始寻找白 其,根据线索他来到了石更国。在这里等着他的,除了那些强壮的新敌人, 还有一个来自斯特国的,似曾相识的人...

altTitles.ja: ハーメルンのバイオリン弾き
魔法提琴手

altTitles.en: Violonist of Hameln

description.en:
Pandora's Box led a cursed existence. Through the curiosity of a woman, evil was unleashed and very nearly covered the world in darkness. Miraculously, humanity managed to seal Maou Kestra back into the box, but only with immense sacrifices. Even without their lord, the demons are still a formidable force that has only grown stronger with time, locked in the abandoned capital of the North, Hameln. Fifteen years have passed since that fateful battle…  
  
Enter Hamel, a travelling minstrel who is so self-centered that he'd sooner cook his guardian crow (and family friend), Oboe, than go hungry for even a minute. Welcome to the world of music and hilarious insanity that is the Violinist of Hameln. Watch as Hamel takes cheap shots at his opponents and bashes pigeons with his giant violin and turns them into dinner.  
  
How WILL the world be saved from Maou Kestra (it's a pun for orchestra, if you haven't noticed) with a hero such as this?

title.en: Hazure Waku no Joutai Ijou Skill de Saikyou ni Natta Ore ga Subete wo Juurin Suru made

altTitles.en: Failure Frame: I Became the Strongest and Annihilated Everything With Low-Level Spells

altTitles.ru: Я стал самым сильным с провальным навыком 【 ненормальное состояние】, я разрушу всё

altTitles.ja: ハズレ枠の【状態異常スキル】で最強になった俺がすべてを蹂躙するまで

altTitles.ko: 꽝취급 받는 [상태이상 스킬]로 최강이 된 내가 전부 유린할 때까지

altTitles.zh: 最强的我最终蹂躏一切

altTitles.zh-hk: 靠廢柴技能【狀態異常】成為最強的我將蹂躪一切

description.en: During the school trip Touka and his classmates are summoned to another world. However, Touka was the only one with the lowest rank: E-rank - an extremely low status compared to his classmates. Thus the former mob-character and abandoned hero, will absolutely become the strongest devil as he advances and strikes back.
description.pt:
Durante a viagem escolar Touka e seus colegas são convocados para outro mundo. No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank-E - um status extremamente baixo em comparação com seus colegas de classe. Assim, o personagem secundário e herói abandonado, se tornara o mais forte à medida que avança e contra-ataca.


---
description.pt-br: Durante a viagem escolar, Touka e seus colegas são convocados para outro mundo. No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank E – um status extremamente baixo comparado a seus colegas de classe. Assim, o herói abandonado se tornará absolutamente o demônio mais forte à medida que avança e contra-ataca.

description.en:
“Until the day humanity falls.”

In the year 2020, Earth’s magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and merciless—as soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhe’s mutation goes undetected by Lu Feng’s eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds…

Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction.
description.pl:
Ponury i niegościnny świat po katastrofie ekologicznej. Spustoszoną ziemię bombarduje promieniowanie kosmiczne. Niedobitki ludzkości schroniły się w dwóch ostatnich ocalałych bazach, desperacko próbując przetrwać. Każdy kontakt z obcym organizmem żywym grozi skażeniem genetycznym.

Do bazy ludzi trafia zagubiony chłopak, który w rzeczywistości nie jest nawet człowiekiem. Los styka go z bezlitosnym sędzią, wyszkolonym do tropienia i likwidowania mutantów. Niespodziewanie ich znajomość przeradza się w coś więcej…

Polskie tłumaczenie powieści dostępne tutaj: https://www.wattpad.com/story/251281478-little-mushroom

altTitles.ja: 雷雷雷
ライライライ

description.en:
It's been 50 years since the war with aliens.

Sumire Ichigaya is 18 years old. To pay off her debts, she works for a company that exterminates space pests. One day, Sumire's daily life changes drastically when she is kidnapped by a UFO! The voice of someone in her head, "space vermin attacking" and even a military company is after her!

title.en: Legend of the Galactic Heroes (MICHIHARA Katsumi)

altTitles.ja: 銀河英雄伝説

description.en:
Manga adaptation of 1980s.  
  
Five hundred years ago, Rudolf von Goldenbaum united the disparate governments of humankind and established a mighty human empire, a tribute to his own greatness that stretched across the galaxy. Demanding loyalty and discipline, Rudolf created an order designed to long outlast his own rule; but all human works fade in time. Today, the decaying empire faces the threat of the Free Planets Alliance, and military leaders on both sides jockey for power in the face of a seemingly inevitable conflict. On the side of the empire, the young general Reinhard von Lohengramm sees war as opportunity, and the empire as soft clay ready for his own sculpting. On the side of the alliance, would-be historian Yang Wen-li would like nothing better than to live out his days in peace - but times of war have little use for men who waste their days studying the mistakes of the past. Circumstances will make heroes and villains of both these men, as they write new history one blood-splattered page at a time.  
  


---
description.ru:
История человечества всегда была историей войн, во все времена, во все эпохи. И во все эпохи находятся люди, оставляющие след в истории, чьи имена выжжены на её скрижалях. Этих людей называют героями.  
В третьем тысячелетии, когда люди давно переселились с Земли на просторы Галактики, между абсолютной монархией Галактический Рейх и республикой Союз Свободных Планет уже 150 лет продолжается война. И на озарённом пламенем войны небосклоне зажигаются звёзды героев, судьба которых - изменить мир.

title.en: Catherine's Key to a Happy Life

altTitles.en: Rejected Lady Enjoying a Modest Life
The Abandoned Bachelorette Enjoys Her Simple Life
A Delightful Simple Life of a Single, After Leaving Home

altTitles.es-la: La sencilla vida de soltería disfrutada después de ser abandonada

description.en:
Catherine did not want much.

Even if she did not have luxurious clothes and shoes, she was alright with her hideously frayed bedroom curtains and her shoes that were so worn at the soles it was different in height.

It had been two years since she started enduring it for the sake of her late mother.

She no longer felt the need to do that.

"Alright, I'll leave."

Catherine was tired of everything.

***

"Are you the Pope's watchdog? You've done well coming all the way here."

The man who intruded her home was drenched from head to toe.
She could see mud squished beneath his black leather boots.

Unbelievable.
To think he would drag in not grass, but mud, while she was cleaning the floors!

"You've got quite the disguise. Even I was almost fooled into thinking that you're just an ordinary city woman---"
"Wipe it."

She pushed the rag she held onto the man.

"Why are you looking at me so foolishly? I told you to wipe the floor. And it's not proper to show your sword when it's our first time meeting each other. Is it not enough that you intruded that you would want to be reported for attempted murder?"
description.pl:
Catherine nie chciała wiele. Nawet jeśli nie miała luksusowych ubrań i butów, odpowiadały jej ohydnie postrzępione zasłony w sypialni i szpilki, które były tak zużyte na podeszwach, że różniły się wysokością od zwykłych butów. Minęły dwa lata, odkąd zaczęła to znosić ze względu na swoją zmarłą matkę. Teraz nie czuła już takiej potrzeby. 
"W porządku, odejdę." 
Catherine była zmęczona wszystkim. 
*** 
Jesteś strażniczką papieża? Dobrze zrobiłaś, że tu przybyłaś". 
Mężczyzna, który wtargnął do jej domu, był przemoczony od stóp do głów. Pod jego czarnymi skórzanymi butami widać było błoto. 
Niewiarygodne. 
Pomyśleć, że wlókł nie trawę, ale błoto, podczas gdy ona czyściła podłogi! 
"Masz niezłe przebranie. Nawet ja dałem się nabrać, że jesteś zwykłą kobietą z miasta..." 
"Wytrzyj to." 
Pchnęła szmatę, którą trzymała, na mężczyznę. 
"Dlaczego patrzysz na mnie tak głupio? Kazałam ci wytrzeć podłogę. I nie wypada pokazywać miecza, gdy spotykamy się po raz pierwszy. Czy nie wystarczy już, że tu wtargnąłeś, że chcesz być jeszcze zgłoszony za usiłowanie zabójstwa?

altTitles.ja: エロティック×アナボリック

description.en:
Ageki Kyousuke, a fat guy with a big appetite, has always been interested in Mitsukura Itsuha, a girl who doesn't stand out in his class.   
He comes across her alone on the rooftop after school, exposing her erotic body in an extreme swimsuit!  
Kyousuke finds out Itsuha's secret, which is too unexpected to be ……!
